Class LevelFileReader

java.lang.Object
LevelFileReader
public class LevelFileReader extends Object
A class which reads levels from files, and saves levels to file.
Author:
James McWilliams

      Returns:
      if the level has been saved previously

    • getDropRates

      public static int[] getDropRates()
      dropRates will contain exactly 8 ints, each representing the odds of a certain power being given to the player. These powers are, in order: Bombs, Gas, Sterilisation items, Poison, Male sex changes, Female sex changes, No-entry signs, and Death rats.
      Returns:
      dropRates the chances that each power will drop.

    • getInProgTimer

      public static int getInProgTimer()

    • getInProgInv

      public static int[] getInProgInv()
      Gets the items in a player's saved inventory. The powers are in the following order: Bombs, Gas, Sterilisation items, Poison, Male sex changes, Female sex changes, No-entry signs, and Death rats.
      Returns:
      powers in the player's inventory

    • saveLevel

      public static void saveLevel(Controller controller, String levelName) throws IOException
      Writes a level to a .txt file in a format that can be read back by the file reader.
      Parameters:
      levelName - The name for the level. Formatted as "level-X-USER.txt" where X is a number and USER is the profile's name.
      Throws:
      IOException - if it can't find the file specified.

    • ratToStr

      public static String ratToStr(Rat rat)
      Turns a rat into a string that can be pasted into a level file to be loaded later.
      Parameters:
      rat - The rat to convert
      Returns:
      A string that can be read by the file reader

    • powerToStr

      public static String powerToStr(Power power)
      Turns a power into a string that can be pasted into a level file to be loaded later.
      Parameters:
      power - The power to convert
      Returns:
      A string that can be read by the file reader

    • directionIntToEnum

      public static Rat.Direction directionIntToEnum(int directionInt)
      Converts a direction stored as an int into a Direction enum.
      Parameters:
      directionInt - int from 0-3 representing north, east, south, west
      Returns:
      Direction

    • loadNormalLevelFile

      public static void loadNormalLevelFile(Controller controller, String filename, boolean loadDefaultObjects) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads a level from a txt file. The "default objects" referred to by the loadDefaultObjects parameter are the rats which spawn at the start of the level. This should be false if this function is loading a saved level.
      Parameters:
      filename - the level file to load
      loadDefaultObjects - whether the level's default objects should be loaded
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the level file isn't found

    • loadSavedLevelFile

      public static void loadSavedLevelFile(Controller controller, String filename) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads content from a level's save file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the level save file to load.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file can't be found.

    • deleteAllConnectedFiles

      public static void deleteAllConnectedFiles(String levelName)
      Deletes all in progress files which are connected to chosen level.
      Parameters:
      levelName - name of the level

    • deleteAllConnectedFilesFromProfile

      public static void deleteAllConnectedFilesFromProfile(String pathToProfileSaves, String levelName, String profileName)
      Deletes all in progress files (from profile directory) which are connected to chosen level.
      Parameters:
      pathToProfileSaves - path to file in progress
      levelName - path to level file
      profileName - name of the profile directory

    • isConnectedLevel

      public static boolean isConnectedLevel(String levelName, String levelInProgress) throws FileNotFoundException
      Checks if file in progress is connected to level file.
      Parameters:
      levelName - directory to the level file
      levelInProgress - directory to the file in progress
      Returns:
      true if file is connected, false otherwise
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file in progress is missing

    • tilesToTileMap

      public static Tile[][] tilesToTileMap(String[] tiles, int width, int height)
      Converts the strings that store the tiles into a 2d array that can be used by other classes.
      Parameters:
      tiles - The strings to be converted
      Returns:
      a tile map
